author: cmpilato
msg: Move deltification outside the commit process.  The addresses Issue #651.

author: sussman
msg: Create initial framework for issue #648:  an fs dump/load format.
* libsvn_repos/dump.c:  new file to implement svn_repos_dump_fs().
Make sure you re-run 'gen-make.py build.conf', everyone.  :-)
(usage): description of 'svnadmin dump' command -- same as 'svnadmin lsrevs'

author: cmpilato
msg: Fix for Issue #679 (methinks) and some other misc stuff.
(harvest_committables): Add 'parent_entry' parameter, and use it to
detect when children of copies need to be noted as commit items.
(svn_wc_add): Disallow adds to parent dirs scheduled for deletion.

author: kfogel
msg: Regression test for working copy text base corruption detection.
expected failures.  Callers changed as necessary.
